metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12415 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: In Apache POI up to 4.1.0, when using the tool XSSFExportToXml to convertuser-provided Microsoft Excel documents, a specially crafted document canallow an attacker to read files from the local filesystem or from internalnetwork resources via XML External Entity (XXE) Processing.

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
